basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Sarcina Lutea (MIC=1.9 µM).Fungi:Aspergillus niger (MIC=2.9 µM), Candida albicans (MIC=2.9 µM), C. fructus (MIC=2.9 µM), Candida wickerhamii (MIC=2.9 µM), Pichia pastoris (MIC=2.9 µM), P. stiptis (MIC=2.9 µM), Pachysolen tannophilus (MIC=2.9 µM), Trichoderma harzianum (MIC=2.9 µM), Zygosaccharomyces marxianus (MIC=2.9 µM).
